Boston’s Only Board Game Cafe & Bar - Tavern of Tales Book Now (617) 708 - 0172 Cart 0 Menu Events How to Play Members FAQ Contact/Jobs Reservations STORE Cart 0 Menu Events How to Play Members FAQ Contact/Jobs Reservations STORE Cafe & Bar Scroll Tavern of Tales Cafe & Bar Booking Info Food & Drink Menus Co-Working Office Hours Three Ways to Play Join an event Participate in any of our regular events such as weekly board game meetups, drop-in drop-out D&D campaigns, casual Commander, and trivia night. View events Rent a room Rent out our private rooms to gain access to our expanded library of board games. Each room is fully sound proofed for your experience and servers will stop by to take your orders or deliver food! Reserve ahead Free play Get access to our shelf of free board games curated by our team. Great for large parties and quick to learn. How to play Recurring Events Dungeons & Dragons Come enjoy D&D in our private sound proof rooms. Each room comes with an audio system to experience your campaigns in an immersive new way. Looking to join a campaign? Our D&D Discord Community is the place to look for campaign info! Magic the Gathering From our own in-house Magic league to Pre Release events we host all kinds of Magic events and sell products in store or online. Come join our growing Magic the Gathering community for Commander on Wednesday & Saturday. Tavern Trivia General trivia brought to you every week with questions written by our own staff. Come and join in for your chance at prizes! Event Schedule D&D Community Campaigns Join your fellow adventurers at Tavern of Tales, Join Discord to participate in our monthly Dungethon or join pop up volunteer one shots! Tavern Trivia Thursdays Trivia Thursday’s are back at Boston’s only board game bar! Join us every Thursday starting at 7:30pm for Trivia. Bring your best team of 4 and compete for some cool prizes! Board Game Meetup Looking for other people to play your favorite table top games? Make use of our lovely game rooms and meet other members of Boston's Tabletop community every Tuesday evening. We even host Game Dev Showcases where local game devs from the Game Maker’s Guild will showcase their new games! Casual Commander Our Magic Community is very welcoming and you can find all power levels here at the table from precon commander decks to CEDH. Wednesdays 5pm-11pm & Saturdays 10am-4pm Tavern of Tales Discord Join an ever growing community of table top gamers, dice rollers, card shufflers and eSports pros located in the Boston and Mission Hill area. Join the Discord Gift Cards for the Ultimate Game Night Treat your friends, family, and loved ones to a memorable experience at Tavern of Tales, where they can explore our diverse collection of board games. Create cherished moments, connect with others, and make any occasion special. Get your gift cards today! Visit Shop Tavern of Tales Reviews Great board game bar, great signature drinks and very knowledgeable staff. You'll wanna revisit to try the whole menu! Huffenstein The staff is so friendly! They help pick out games to play and can explain the rules. The drinks and food are fantastic too! Emily Tons of board games, card games, and games like D&D and MTG for those interested, just an overall fantastic spot. Alyssa B Super cool place that offers lots of different events & games. There are always people meeting up here to play MTG, D&D, etc. Michael Laccavole Really wonderful place to go and hangout to play some board games or D&D. Great drinks, great food and the absolute best staff. Erin M Awesome space for game enthusiasts of all kinds. Friendly, cool ownership and staff, consistent events, active Discord channels, and great food and drinks. Eric E Frequently Asked Questions Is there a time / table limit? Friday-Sunday (and any time we are at/near capacity) we have a 90 minute time/table limit for the cafe and bar area. No reservation is required to come to our cafe and play games from our shelf. You will need a reservation for a private room, which can be made at this link within 1 hour of an open reservation slot. Is there an age limit at Tavern of Tales? No However, any person under 18 years of age must be accompanied by an adult at all times. Can I bring my dog? Yes! We have a dog friendly outdoor patio. Your dog must be up to date on their vaccinations and rabies shots, and must be able to prove this if asked. We are unable to accomodate animals inside, so do keep the weather in mind. We are unable to provide water dishes, but can fill yours up if you bring your own! Service dogs that are trained to assist people with disabilities are permitted on licensed establishments. Please note emotional support animals and pets do not qualify as service animals. For more information, please visit this link . Unfortunately no dogs are allowed in the indoor space except for trained service dogs. The host may ask you what service your dog is trained to provide. Emotional support animals are not allowed indoors at Tavern of Tales. What types of ID do you accept? As per the City of Boston , the only forms of acceptable ID at any establishment serving or selling alcohol are as follows: A Massachusetts Driver’s License; A Massachusetts Liquor Identification Card; A Massachusetts Identification Card; A Passport Issued by the United States or a government that is officially recognized by the United States; A Passport Card for a Passport issued by the United States; and A Military Identification Card. Are reservations required? Reservations are not necessary, but we highly encourage groups to reserve rooms as a way to skip the waitlist and guarantee your spot during peak times. Visit https://www.tavernoftales.com/reservations to start your booking. For parties of 7 or more, contact info@tavernoftales.com to save your spot. Dress Code & Body Hygeine Policy We want every guest to enjoy a comfortable, welcoming experience. To ensure the comfort of all, we ask that guests follow a few simple guidelines regarding attire and personal hygiene: We are a casual dining establishment — jeans, t-shirts, sneakers, and other relaxed attire are perfectly acceptable. We do ask that clothing be clean and presentable (no excessive rips, stains, or offensive graphics). For safety reasons, shirts and shoes are required at all times. To provide a pleasant atmosphere for all guests, we ask that visitors maintain reasonable personal hygiene. Excessive or unpleasant odors — whether from clothing, poor hygiene, or strong fragrances — may disrupt the dining experience for others. Freshly laundered clothing and use of deodorant are strongly encouraged. Please avoid wearing heavy perfumes, colognes, or sprays, as these may affect the comfort of nearby guests. Our goal is to create a welcoming environment for everyone. We ask that all attire and grooming reflect consideration for fellow diners. Guests who do not meet these standards may be respectfully asked to leave or return at another time. This is at the discretion of restaurant management and staff to ensure the comfort of all diners. We appreciate your cooperation and understanding in helping us keep Tavern of Tales enjoyable for all.
